text: The discography of American rapper Mac Lethal consists of 4 studio albums, 12 mixtapes, 6 extended plays, and 26 singles (including eight as a featured artist). ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of studio albums, with selected chart positions |- !
